body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling NoteWorthy Music School. This is Patrick Kelly speaking. May I have your name, please?

Hi, this is Helen Henderson.

Thank you, Helen. How can I assist you today?

I'm really upset about my latest bill. It's way higher than I expected!

I’m sorry to hear that you’re experiencing billing issues, Helen. Let me look into this for you. Could you please confirm your account number?

It's three zero two four five.

Thank you. And could I have your email address on file to verify your information?

My email is helenhenderson@example.com.

I appreciate your patience, Helen. I reviewed your account, and it seems there was an error in the billing. We will correct it and ensure you are only charged the correct amount. I apologize for the inconvenience.

Thank you, Patrick. I'm relieved to hear that. I hope this won't happen again.

You're welcome, Helen. We'll make sure this is resolved promptly. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. If there’s anything else you need, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time.

analysis.body: In this conversation, Patrick Kelly from NoteWorthy discusses billing with Helen Henderson. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.
